item.title: Roadwork - US 82 eastbound and westbound from mile marker 175 to mile marker 191
item.description:
Title: US 82 eastbound and westbound from mile marker 175 to mile marker 191
Description: The project consists of Roadway Rehabilitation, Shoulder Work, and Permanent Signing. Construction began July 24, 2014. The project is for 320 Calendar Days ending in July 2015. There is an 11' width restriction. Please adhere to the Construction Signing and watch out for workers. Single lane closure on the project expect 10+ minute delays due to pilot car operation. Traffic will be slowed down to 45 MPH and 35 MPH throughout the work zones and be aware of potentially poor conditions due to winter weather. Double Fines will be enforced. Fisher Sand and Gravel Superintendent, Jimmy Taylor 777-229-9506 . NMDOT Project Manager, Donna Gililland 575-626-4857.
Post Date: 2014-07-24 08:44:50.913
Update Date: 2015-02-20 14:10:34.0

item.title: Roadwork - New Mexico 41 from mile marker 55 to mile marker 56 Galisteo
item.description:
Title: New Mexico 41 from mile marker 55 to mile marker 56 Galisteo
Description: The New Mexico Department of Transportation (NMDOT) construction work on NM 41 near the Village of Galisteo between mile post 55.53 and mile post 56.1 on April 21, 2014. This work will include the replacement of two bridges and roadway improvements between the two bridges. The bridge work will be located at the San Cristobal Arroyo Bridge south of the Village of Galisteo and the Galisteo Creek Bridge on the southern edge of the Village of Galisteo. Traffic Impacts: Project has been placed on Winter Suspension until Spring of 2015. NM 41 roadway- The northbound and southbound traffic will travel through one lane. during this time. NO oversize vehicles or commercial loads are allowed through the work zone, and NO oversize loads allowed between Stanley and South of County Road 42. There is a 10 width restriction. Motorists traveling south on NM 41 can use U.S. 285 south to Clines Corners to I-40. Motorists traveling north on NM 41 can use I-40 east to Clines Corners to U.S. 285 north. The detours are equivalent to approximately 21 miles. Project anticipated to be completed June 2015; weather permitting
Post Date: 2014-06-13 10:34:04.987
Update Date: 2015-02-11 12:25:20.037
Expiration Date: unknown

item.title: Roadwork - US 54 northbound and southbound from mile marker 71 to mile marker 73
item.description:
Title: US 54 northbound and southbound from mile marker 71 to mile marker 73
Description: Roadway reconstruction underway consisting of full bridge reconstruction between MP 72.157 and MP 72.810 .One lane travel through detour zone north and south bound. The Contractor may be working 7 days a week 6:00am to 6:00pm NMDOT urges motorists to watch for equipment and personnel in the work zone and adhere to all construction signage. Speed limits have been reduced to 40 MPH. THERE IS A 11' WIDTH RESTRICTION IN THIS AREA, ANY VEHICHILE OVER THIS MUST SEEK ALTERANATIVE ROUTE. Project is set to be complete January 1, 2016. Contacts: Jerry Hickman, NMDOT Project Manager 575-585-2090 or 575-626-0804 Warren Dozier, G. Sandoval Project Superintendent 505-238-2970
Post Date: 2015-02-18 12:57:45.0

item.title: Lane Closure - US 70 eastbound and westbound from mile marker 149 to mile marker 148 Las Cruces
item.description:
Title: US 70 eastbound and westbound from mile marker 149 to mile marker 148 Las Cruces
Description: NMDOT with Sandoval Construction have placed traffic control along US 70 North Main with lane restrictions of 10 foot, and reduction in speed throughout the work zone. Traffic has been switched to the eastbound lanes between North Main and Gallagher Drive, and then split again from Gallagher to just north of Madrid. There will be NO through lane or left turn access on Madrid Street to US 70 North Main until further notice. The contractor has extended the concrete wall barrier in order to install utility lines. Businesses are open, please contact them for hours of operation. Motorists are encouraged to proceed with caution and expect delay. Please seek an alternate route due to work zone.
Post Date: 2014-04-11 15:44:46.31
Update Date: 2015-02-23 08:10:46.9

Description: North of Truth or Consequences the NMDOT and Mountain States Constructors have shifted traffic the north and southbound lanes where motorists will travel on the newly constructed bridge for north and southbound movement. Traffic will continue be restrict to 12.5 foot width restrictions between mile markers 88 to 92 as concrete wall barriers are placed. The contractor is currently reconstructing the existing bridge which requires the northbound OFF ramp to be CLOSED at exit 92 due to reconstruction of the northbound lanes, please follow traffic control signage within the work zone. item.title: Roadwork - US 285 from mile marker 248 Fying C Ranch to mile marker 250
item.description:
Title: US 285 from mile marker 248 Fying C Ranch to mile marker 250
Description: The New Mexico Department of Transportation (NMDOT) continues work on the U.S. 285/ I-40 interchange at Clines Corners. This improvement work includes the lengthening and realignment of the westbound exit ramp, the realignment of the westbound entrance ramp, and the lengthening of the eastbound on and off ramps on I-40. The U.S. 285 bridge over I-40 will be widened 24 feet to accommodate two lanes of traffic each way. The work on U.S. 285 from mile marker 248.84 to mile marker 250.46 includes the reconstruction and widening of the existing lanes to accommodate two lanes of traffic each way. Other work on the project includes new drainage structures, new curb and gutter, new signing and the installation of an intelligent transportation system. Traffic Impacts: There are no lane closure on I-40 at this time. The contractor is currently working on US285 overpass. There is a northbound lane closure on US 285. The US 285 northbound and southbound traffic are traveling in one lane in each direction. Drivers are urged to proceed with caution through the work zone, observe traffic control signs and reduce speed to the posted limit.
Post Date: 2014-09-17 15:09:04.397
Update Date: 2015-02-11 12:25:20.037
Expiration Date: unknown

item.title: Roadwork - Interstate 25 northbound and southbound from mile marker 293 to mile marker 294 (CANONCITO)
item.description:
Title: Interstate 25 northbound and southbound from mile marker 293 to mile marker 294 (CANONCITO)
Description: Santa Fe The New Mexico Department of Transportation (NMDOT) began bridge replacement work on I-25 north of Santa Fe at Canoncito between mile markers 293 and 294. The scope of the project includes bridge rehabilitation, roadway and ramp reconstruction, and pavement rehabilitation for 1.42 miles within Santa Fe County. Tom Griego is the NMDOT Project Engineer. AUI is the contractor for this project. Traffic Impacts: Tthe cross road under I-25 (Sleeping Dog Road) and the I- 25 southbound ramp is CLOSED. This closure remains in effect until June 2015. Local traffic and residents on the south side of I-25 will be detoured to the Valencia Exit 297 to access I-25 South. Local traffic and residents on the north side of I-25 (Old Las Vegas Highway) will be detoured to the Lamy Exit 290 to access I-25 northbound and southbound. -All lanes are OPENED on the I-25 northbound and southbound lanes anes. Project anticipated to be completed July 2015; weather permitting. NMDOT urges motorists to proceed through the work zone with caution, watch for construction personnel.
Post Date: 2014-04-08 16:36:30.167
Update Date: 2015-02-11 12:25:20.037
Expiration Date: unknown

item.title: Lane Closure - New Mexico 423 at mile marker 0
item.description:
Title: New Mexico 423 at mile marker 0
Description: Ongoing through Thursday 2/26 from 9 pm to 5 am each evening (Bixby Electric 350-1098) The N_M 45 (Coors) and N_M 4_23 (Paseo Del Norte) intersection will have the following various lane closures at different times for traffic signal repairs: - The Paseo Del Norte westbound to Coors southbound turn lanes will be closed. - The Coors southbound to Paseo Del Norte eastbound turn lanes will be closed. - Coors northbound at Paseo Del Norte will have the 2 right lanes closed - Coors southbound at Paseo Del Norte will have the 2 right lanes closed - Expect delays!!!!!!!!! Ongoing through Thursday 2/26 from 9 am to 3 pm each weekday (Bixby Electric) The N_M 45 (Coors) and N_M 4_23 (Paseo Del Norte) intersection will have the following various lane closures at different times for traffic signal repairs: - The Paseo Del Norte westbound to Coors southbound turn lanes will be reduced to one lane - The Coors southbound to Paseo Del Norte eastbound turn lanes will be reduced to one lane - Expect delays!!!!!!!!!
Post Date: 2015-01-27 15:59:05.217
Update Date: 2015-02-19 15:23:32.0
Expiration Date: 2015-02-27 05:00:00.0

item.title: Roadwork - New Mexico 460 from mile marker 1 to mile marker 3
item.description:
Title: New Mexico 460 from mile marker 1 to mile marker 3
Description: In Anthony, NM the NMDOT and Smith and Aguirre are working on installing a storm culvert drain pipe under NM 460 from Miller Street to Landers Drive. The contractor will construct a pond beside the Community Development Center, along with mill and inlay from New Mexico/Texas state line to O'Harra Road/NM 460. The project will also have new ADA compliant features such as sidewalks with landing and turnouts along NM 460.
